publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2430 George Foulkes: Happy Birthday, Sir Sean Connery—That the Parliament wishes Sir Sean Connery well on his 78th birthday; recognises his contribution in the 1997 referendum campaign, which resulted in this proud Parliament’s ability to deliver for the people of Scotland, and, above all else, celebrates his ongoing lifelong contribution to the British film industry. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Elaine Murray*, John Park*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Ian McKee*
S3M-2430 Happy Birthday, Sir Sean Connery (lodged on 25 August 2008) David Stewart*
